alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 1:04PM EST until January 22 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Virginia, Bath County. In West Virginia, Eastern Greenbrier and Western Greenbrier Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Glaze of ice on trees and other elevated objects. Patchy ice possible on untreated roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The public is encouraged to report ice amounts to the National Weather Service via email at rnk.skywarn@noaa.gov... through Facebook or Twitter...or by calling 1...8 6 6...2 1 5... 4 3 2 4. Pictures are greatly appreciated.
